attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The purpose, validity and impact of e- petitions on government policy making is nil. At best they are a method of airing opinion and grievance to a limited and disgruntled audience but in essence they are an anachronistic hyper-real simulation of democracy in a political system that has lost touch with reality in favour of its own prefered reality.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
